given.text: Yibei is an extremely driven and hard-working person. I'm delighted to work with her on a price savings calculator at PetPlus. Yibei picks up new concepts very quickly, and she is always keen on gaining new knowledge and finding solutions. She helped to build a sophisticated model to project membership saving which is to be applied across all PetPlus interactions with clients both through the web and the call center. I'm very impressed by Yibei's strong problem solving capability and how she communicated her brilliant ideas with persuasion. And I'm very much looking forward to working with her again in the future if our paths cross again. See less
